remarks.para: Except for ER operations beyond 120 minutes, may be inoperative closed provided aircraft is not operated in known or forecast icing conditions.

note.para: No flight in known or forecast icing conditions.

numlitem.para: Operations in known or forecast icing conditions prohibited.

placard.para: Placard Wing Anti-ice Switch "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Check that ANTI-ICE WING switch on overhead panel is OFF.
Gain access to wing anti-ice valve through fixed wing upper panel 521AB (left wing) or 621AB (right wing).

warning.para: TAI DUCT MAY BE HOT. ALLOW DUCT TO COOL BEFORE CLOSING VALVE. SEVERE BURNS MAY RESULT.

numlitem.para: If valve is not closed, wrench manual drive nut (7/16 inch hex drive) counterclockwise to close valve.
Lift and rotate valve lock 90° clockwise to lock valve closed. A pushbutton on the valve housing allows manual operation. The valve can only be locked in the full closed position.
